name: Zscaler
description: This app implements containment and investigative actions on Zscaler

base_url.description: Base URL (It should not end with /api/v1 e.g. https://zscaler_instance.net)

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Fetch sandbox report for provided md5 file hash

example_values: Binary contains paths to development resources
Sandbox report successfully fetched for the provided md5 hash

ip.description: A comma separated list of IPs

actions.verbose: If a url_category is specified, it will add the IP(s) as a rule to that category. If it is left blank, it will instead add the IP(s) to the global blacklist.

ip.description: A comma seperated list of IPs

url.description: A comma separated list of URLs
